name: Speller Bee
overview: Get 100% every week on your spelling test at school! Speller Bee utilizes First Byte's Smooth Talker speech technology to give you a powerful talking spelling tool. Although there are grade level lists stored on the disk, for the first time you can enter your own spelling words. Speller Bee assists you until you have successfully spelled each word correctly and then gives you a practice 'Spelling Bee' to test your skill. In addition, you can use your spelling lists to play 3 exciting games that hide, scramble and change your words until you spell them correctly and win!
